description: I grew up playing this and other ambrosia games which have unique charm. Ambrosia's games had prestige for being the most polished and high performance shareware games on the Mac by a mile. It launched and ran perfectly on my cantankerous Arch box.
summary: Great classic mac game. Worked first try

description: Maelstrom was a great early 90's Mac shareware game. I'm amazed to find it here -- and equally amazed that it's still as fun as it was decades ago!
